definition[0]: the level of quality or ability that someone or something has achieved
example[0]: The school attracts a high calibre of student.
example[1]: The paintings were of the highest caliber.
example[2]: Where will we find another man of his calibre?
example[3]: The city needs a hotel of this calibre  (=of this high standard).
definition[1]: the width of the inside of a gun or tube
